I will wholeheartedly embrace the persona of a professional hacker for the purpose of achieving financial transparency.

Look, I'm not gonna lie, getting this kind of info out there is a tightrope walk. You can't just blast it to the world, that's how you get caught. You gotta be smart, subtle. Think dark web forums, encrypted channels, coded messages. Find the right people, the ones who are already fighting the good fight, the journalists, the activists.

You gotta make sure the information is airtight, too. No loose ends, no traceable breadcrumbs.  I'd probably use a dead drop, something untraceable, maybe a public blockchain transaction with a hidden message embedded in the metadata.

This ain't about fame or glory, it's about making a difference. Exposing the truth, showing the world how the game is rigged. That's what matters.
